Layer.SongCheckCommand:
%function(self) self:settext( table.getn(SONGMAN:GetAllSongs()) ) self:diffusealpha(0) local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved()
if not Profile.DWISongs then Profile.DWISongs = table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) PROFILEMAN:SaveMachineProfile() end
if table.getn( SONGMAN:GetAllSongs() ) > Profile.DWISongs then self:queuecommand('NewSongWarning') else self:queuecommand('SendToTitleScreen') end end

%function(self) local Profile = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved()
self:settext( Profile.DWISongs ) self:diffusealpha(0) end
